agent_utterance: It's hot out, so let's start with a tiny, hydrating snack and a quick check-in. Have 1 small apple or a small handful of almonds (about 80–100 kcal) with a large glass of water. After you eat, pause for 2 minutes and rate your hunger from 0 (no hunger) to 10 (extreme hunger) and note your mood. If your hunger is still above 3 after the pause, you can add a very small second bite (e.g., a few more almonds or a thin fruit slice). Then log your hunger and mood to reinforce the self-monitoring.
